law.text: The proposition to be voted upon shall be stated without emblems and voters shall designate a "Yes" or a "No" vote. In any election the form of the proposition shall be, "Are you in favor of the sale of alcoholic beverages in (name of county or city)?".
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 360, sec. 62, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 3. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-6.
